faq.question: My barcode scanner can't read the barcode.

answer.p: There are many things that can go wrong when you generate and print barcodes. Please go to the Troubleshooting page for more information.

faq.question: My barcode scanner sends some wrong characters.

answer.p: Please consult the Troubleshooting page for more information.

faq.question: I've got error messages that contain the words "avalon" and "framework". What's wrong?

answer.p: Most probably you have an outdated version of Avalon Framework in your classpath. This can happen if you're working with FOP 0.20.5, for example, which contains an older version of Avalon Framework. Please use the one supplied with Barcode4J or download the latest release directly from the Avalon site.

faq.question: How can I help write documentation?

answer.p: This project uses Apache Forrest to generate documentation from XML. Please download a copy of Forrest, which can be used to validate, develop and render a project site.
